tool_description: Get SpamAssassin score of an email by submitting it's MIME format.
name: Spam Filter
title: Spam Filter

api_list.name: Filter
api_list.description: Scan MIME parts of an email and get spam filter score
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spam-filter1.p.rapidapi.com/scan"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spam-filter1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://spam-filter1.p.rapidapi.com/scan"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spam-filter1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
